about_the_game:
"Sushi Warrior: Secret Plan," a 2D jumping action game where you control the protagonist Sushi Warrior to achieve the goal. Although the game's physics judgment is quite accurate, you will need precise control and an unbreakable spirit. As a hint, you should be careful with traps and carefully choose the location and timing of your jumps.

The game supports both keyboard and gamepad, and while playing with a gamepad is recommended, there won't be much difference. You must reach the top of the map by moving, jumping, wall jumping, and looking far ahead. Find the appropriate movement route!

Don't worry! There's no need to worry that the game isn't translated because all of the content composed of text has been removed.

However, be warned! This game is not easy. Depending on your play, you may fall dozens of times just trying to leave each area, or you may have to jump hundreds of times. But such suffering will increase your satisfaction when you finally reach the end.

So, are you ready to find out what plan Sushi Warrior has set up? The cute hand-drawn pictures and animations will make your journey even more immersive. Of course, this story is only when you have the physical and judgment for him!

name: Sushi Warrior: Secret Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: window7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1030
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtak

short_description: "Sushi Warrior: Secret Plan" is a 2D jump-action game. With precise physical simulation, this game will put your skills and patience to the test. But be warned, this game is not for the faint of heart.
